jokes.joke: Why did the chicken cross the road? To get to the other side.
I told my plant I wouldn’t water it anymore. It’s now taking legal action.
Parallel lines have so much in common. It’s a shame they’ll never meet.
I used to play piano by ear, but now I use my hands.
I asked the librarian if the library had books on paranoia. She whispered, "They're right behind you."
I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised.
I threw a boomerang a few years ago. Now I live in constant fear.
I asked my dog what's two minus two. He said nothing.
Claustrophobic people are more productive thinking outside the box.
Why don’t skeletons fight each other? They don’t have the guts.
